sentences.en: As fluid resuscitation is ongoing , an expeditious search for sources of bleeding should be made.
sentences.cn: 在液体复苏建立情况下, 应该寻找出血来源.

sentences.en: Ensure all changes to client product are completed in an expeditious manner.
sentences.cn: 确保对所有客户产品变更的完整和及时.

sentences.en: It is more convenient, expeditious and economical than telephone or telegram.
sentences.cn: 它超过电话或电报是更方便 、 迅速和经济的.

sentences.en: The judge said that arbitration was a fair and expeditious decision-making process.
sentences.cn: 法官说仲裁是公平且迅速有效的判决过程。

sentences.en: They are almost as expeditious and effectual as Aladdin's lamp.
sentences.cn: 他们几乎像如意神灯那么迅速有效.

sentences.en: This will assure expeditious processing and reduce the possibility of unnecessary delays.
sentences.cn: 这样可以确保您的宠物,能更迅速运输到目的地,防止一些不必要的耽搁.

trans.tran_cn: 迅速而有效率的，迅速完成的
